$interpreted: Hestia: Pang! Why's the sea so much bigger than Maple Lake?
Pang: Because that is a lake. This is the sea.
Hestia: Ahh! Pang, look! What's that white bird!?
Pang: That is... a seagull.
Puggi: Sea... gull? A gull of the sea? Sea... GUUUUUUUUUUUUUUHHHHHHH—
Hestia: Puggi! Are you alright!?
Puggi: Damn! All that delicious Desert Kingdom food...
Hestia: Is this what those sailors call... seasickness?
Puggi: Hesty, please... help me~
Hestia: We'll be at the port soon, and then we'll rest for a couple of days. Just hang on, Pugster!
Pang: We'll need the rest. The east is all rugged mountains and dense forests. We won't make it without proper precautions.
Hestia: Mountains and forests?
Pang: Yes. The east is quite beautiful, really. It is also home to many different beast tribes.
Pang: Each tribe has its own territory and unique way of life.
Hestia: Oh really?... Wow, 'cause I thought the East Alliance was just one big country...
Pang: It's more complicated than that. Each tribe belongs to one of three sects—
Pang: Wind, fog, and water. Us tigers, for example, belong to the Wind Sect.
Puggi: Ah, no wonder you're such a windbag...
Pang: Legend has it, that after the Holy Dragon fell into its slumber, the earth was consumed by sorrow.
Pang: Engulfed in two hundred years of rain, wind, and fog, after which the three sects were formed.
Hestia: So then, mermaids must belong to the Water Sect.
Pang: Mermaids are demihumans; they're not part of any sect. But yes, their land is closest to the Water Sect's territory.
Hestia: Well duh, why would we hang out around the Wind or Fog Sect...
Pang: Yet, although our lands are separate, as are our customs, we all have one thing in common—respect for the martial arts.
Hestia: Martial arts? You mean everyone likes to fight?
Pang: ...No, not fighting. We use the arts as a means to create bonds, form friendships.
Pang: And once every twenty years we have our Martial Arts Tournament, to which each big tribe can send their most accomplished member.
Pang: The winner then becomes arbiter of the Alliance.
Hestia: Arbiter? Like, the leader of the whole Alliance? Sounds cool~! So who's the arbiter now?
Pang: The current arbiter is...
Izumi: Chieftain of the Kyo Tribe—Kong Maeok.
Pang: ...Judging from your attire, you two are also from the east?
Nigel: No, we're from Atla—
Izumi: We're from the Desert Kingdom. We were just talking about Atlas and the East Alliance.
Nigel: Hey, that hurt...
Hestia: Oh? Do those two places have something to do with one another?
Izumi: Yes, in the past they were deeply intertwined~
Izumi: The Alliance's southern mountains were too steep to pass through—you could only travel by sea.
Izumi: And Atlas' ports were all frozen, so everyone had to catch boats from the Desert Kingdom to go east.
Hestia: Ohh~ So you're both heading to the East Alliance now?
Izumi: Yep~ We're very interested in the east—so many different types of people, and the Martial Arts Tournament should be especially busy this year!
Pang: Yes, the tournament does draw a number of visitors from distant lands... It's our claim to fame, it seems.
Hestia: It sounds incredible, Pang~! I want to go, too!
Izumi: And I heard, although it hasn't been confirmed...
Izumi: ...that there might be a very special contestant this year~
Izumi: Or did you already know that?
Pang: A special contestant? I've not heard of this.
Izumi: Is that so...
Nigel: What's wrong with your bird? It looks unwell.
Hestia: Eh, Puggi? When did you get over there?
Puggi: I don't feel so good... If someone doesn't give me a super tight hug right now, I just might be sick...
Puggi: Eh? So flat...
Izumi: ......
Izumi: Nigel, this bird thing is super soft! Can I keep him?
Puggi: Oooo~ ~ ~
Nigel: No, that's someone else's bird.
Pang: ...Yes, although he is annoying, he is with me.
Nigel: Hear that, Izumi? Playtime's over.
Izumi: Aw man...
Puggi: Pang~ I can't breathhheee...
Pang: And who's fault is that?
Scared Sailor: Uh oh... we've got trouble!
Nigel: What's wrong?
Scared Sailor: Pirates! Everyone hold on, we're gonna pick up speed!
Calm Sailor: The captain is about to go full speed ahead! Everyone remain calm! We'll be docking at the East Alliance shortly.
Hestia: Pang... Pang, isn't it dangerous if we stay up here?
Pang: Everything should be fine. Just stay calm and hold out until we dock.
Puggi: Yeah, Hestia! Don't worry, you've got Puggi protection!
Puggi: We're not gonna let a few pesky pirates ruin a nice boat trip, right!?
Arrogant Pirate: You call that "full speed ahead"?
Arrogant Pirate: You lot couldn't outrun an iceberg in this heap.
Nasty Pirate: Alright, everybody hand over your curren and valuables, unless ya wanna be shark feed!
Pang: This crosses the line.
Nigel: We'll see about who's gonna be shark feed!
Izumi: Ayoo~ Why couldn't we just have a nice relaxing boat ride?
Hestia: Ah! Pang!!
Puggi: You go, Pang! Get him!!
Nigel: Damn... where's the damn port?
Calm Sailor: We're almost there! Just hold on!
Puggi: Mmmmmmng!!!
Hestia: (...Puggi! Hold on!)
Hestia: (Pang!)
Hestia: (Almost...!)

Model.Text: Pang! Why's the sea so much bigger than Maple Lake?
Because that is a lake. This is the sea.
Ahh! Pang, look! What's that white bird!?
That is... a seagull.
Sea... gull? A gull of the sea? Sea... GUUUUUUUUUUUUUUHHHHHHH—
Puggi! Are you alright!?
Damn! All that delicious Desert Kingdom food...
Is this what those sailors call... seasickness?
Hesty, please... help me~
We'll be at the port soon, and then we'll rest for a couple of days. Just hang on, Pugster!
We'll need the rest. The east is all rugged mountains and dense forests. We won't make it without proper precautions.
Mountains and forests?
Yes. The east is quite beautiful, really. It is also home to many different beast tribes.
Each tribe has its own territory and unique way of life.
Oh really?... Wow, 'cause I thought the East Alliance was just one big country...
It's more complicated than that. Each tribe belongs to one of three sects—
Wind, fog, and water. Us tigers, for example, belong to the Wind Sect.
Ah, no wonder you're such a windbag...
Legend has it, that after the Holy Dragon fell into its slumber, the earth was consumed by sorrow.
Engulfed in two hundred years of rain, wind, and fog, after which the three sects were formed.
So then, mermaids must belong to the Water Sect.
Mermaids are demihumans; they're not part of any sect. But yes, their land is closest to the Water Sect's territory.
Well duh, why would we hang out around the Wind or Fog Sect...
Yet, although our lands are separate, as are our customs, we all have one thing in common—respect for the martial arts.
Martial arts? You mean everyone likes to fight?
...No, not fighting. We use the arts as a means to create bonds, form friendships.
And once every twenty years we have our Martial Arts Tournament, to which each big tribe can send their most accomplished member.
The winner then becomes arbiter of the Alliance.
Arbiter? Like, the leader of the whole Alliance? Sounds cool~! So who's the arbiter now?
The current arbiter is...
Chieftain of the Kyo Tribe—Kong Maeok.
...Judging from your attire, you two are also from the east?
No, we're from Atla—
We're from the Desert Kingdom. We were just talking about Atlas and the East Alliance.
Hey, that hurt...
Oh? Do those two places have something to do with one another?
Yes, in the past they were deeply intertwined~
The Alliance's southern mountains were too steep to pass through—you could only travel by sea.
And Atlas' ports were all frozen, so everyone had to catch boats from the Desert Kingdom to go east.
Ohh~ So you're both heading to the East Alliance now?
Yep~ We're very interested in the east—so many different types of people, and the Martial Arts Tournament should be especially busy this year!
Yes, the tournament does draw a number of visitors from distant lands... It's our claim to fame, it seems.
It sounds incredible, Pang~! I want to go, too!
And I heard, although it hasn't been confirmed...
...that there might be a very special contestant this year~
Or did you already know that?
A special contestant? I've not heard of this.
Is that so...
What's wrong with your bird? It looks unwell.
Eh, Puggi? When did you get over there?
I don't feel so good... If someone doesn't give me a super tight hug right now, I just might be sick...
Eh? So flat...
Nigel, this bird thing is super soft! Can I keep him?
Oooo~ ~ ~
No, that's someone else's bird.
...Yes, although he is annoying, he is with me.
Hear that, Izumi? Playtime's over.
Aw man...
Pang~ I can't breathhheee...
And who's fault is that?
Uh oh... we've got trouble!
What's wrong?
Pirates! Everyone hold on, we're gonna pick up speed!
The captain is about to go full speed ahead! Everyone remain calm! We'll be docking at the East Alliance shortly.
Pang... Pang, isn't it dangerous if we stay up here?
Everything should be fine. Just stay calm and hold out until we dock.
Yeah, Hestia! Don't worry, you've got Puggi protection!
We're not gonna let a few pesky pirates ruin a nice boat trip, right!?
You call that "full speed ahead"?
You lot couldn't outrun an iceberg in this heap.
Alright, everybody hand over your curren and valuables, unless ya wanna be shark feed!
This crosses the line.
We'll see about who's gonna be shark feed!
Ayoo~ Why couldn't we just have a nice relaxing boat ride?
Ah! Pang!!
You go, Pang! Get him!!
Damn... where's the damn port?
We're almost there! Just hold on!
Mmmmmmng!!!
(...Puggi! Hold on!)
(Pang!)
(Almost...!)
